title: Can Leona be buffed?
body: I know shes a support but I like playing her in other lanes so please buff her ad and ap scale my friend has purchased Diana and he keeps on saying that shes better then Leona and Leona is a shit champion but i don't believe that i believe she can beat Diana in a 1v1 so please buff Leona she needs it. Some examples are makeing her q with the same ratio than her w and e also maybe she could trigger her own passive by using another spell or with her basic attacks but only doing half the damage.

replies.body: Omg you just compared a fucking tank support to an ap assassin (mid laner). GG
He just compared the Sun to the moon. What a fool, how could he think they were anything alike?
well they are both round, that is all
